DarkDaysAhead.name: Aftershock Expanded
DarkDaysAhead.description: Adds late-game sci-fi factions, reactors, and megastructures to Dark Days Ahead.

DarkDaysAhead.name: Magiclysm Rebalanced
DarkDaysAhead.description: Refines the Magiclysm progression tree with new quests, rituals, and spell variants.

DarkDaysAhead.name: Crazy Cataclysm
DarkDaysAhead.description: Adds whimsical monsters, artifacts, and high-chaos progression challenges.

DarkDaysAhead.name: Cata++ Restored
DarkDaysAhead.description: Community continuation of the classic Cata++ quest and item expansion.

DarkDaysAhead.name: Arcana Faiths
DarkDaysAhead.description: Integrates Arcana artifacts, cults, and rituals into mainline gameplay.

BrightNights.name: Dark Skies Above BN
BrightNights.description: Adds the XEDRA invasion storyline with airships, orbital strikes, and unique missions.

BrightNights.name: Secronom Reanimated
BrightNights.description: Expands aberrant biomancy, cult factions, and experimental mutation paths.

BrightNights.name: Bright Nights Toolset
BrightNights.description: Quality-of-life crafting helpers, auto-learn tweaks, and expanded tool recipes.

BrightNights.name: Modular Turrets BN
BrightNights.description: Placeable turret frames with customizable ammunition logic and power systems.

BrightNights.name: Wilderness Overhaul
BrightNights.description: Refreshes forests, animals, foraging, and camping progression for Bright Nights.

BrightNights.name: Legacy Armory
BrightNights.description: Reintroduces experimental firearms and heavy weapons from classic BN builds.

BrightNights.name: Faction Equipment BN
BrightNights.description: Adds craftable uniforms, insignias, and vehicles for major BN factions.

BrightNights.name: Bionic Professions BN
BrightNights.description: Start scenarios centered on bespoke cybernetic loadouts and implants.

BrightNights.name: Drone Warfare
BrightNights.description: Deploy remote drones, recon craft, signal boosters, and automated patrols.

BrightNights.name: Frozen North
BrightNights.description: Extends Bright Nights with arctic biomes, hazards, and expedition gear.

BrightNights.name: Astral Studies
BrightNights.description: Adds psionics, dream quests, and star-bound anomalies to the Bright Nights world.

BrightNights.name: Community Modpack BN
BrightNights.description: Hand-curated bundle of balance tweaks and extras maintained for Bright Nights.

BrightNights.name: Industrial Tools BN
BrightNights.description: Adds fabrication rigs, presses, and workshop furniture for heavy industry bases.

TheLastGeneration.name: Iron Frontier
TheLastGeneration.description: Introduces dieselpunk convoys, caravans, and hardened raider factions to TLG.

TheLastGeneration.name: Solstice Protocol
TheLastGeneration.description: Story arc revolving around orbital mirrors, weather control, and energy crises.

TheLastGeneration.name: Nomad Radio
TheLastGeneration.description: Adds traveling DJs, radio missions, and morale-driven encounters on the frontier.
